summary: A simple re-texture of the Archmage robes that comes with or without the Assassin\'s Creed symbol!
descriptionHtml:
This basic re-texture gives your Archmage robes a little more... Swag.
     -The edges are rimmed in cold, with a few blue accent diamonds (head and clasp that holds    cape).
     -The fur along the edges of the front and back have had darker stripes that add realism and maybe some warmth in cold Skyrim.
     -The bags have all had a re-texture as well
          -cloth bags now resemble a heftier, thicker quality of cloth
          -Leather satchel on the side has also had a major overhaul, with it\'s exterior looking like rich leather, and a darker, contrasting leather strap with a metal buckle
     -All sides of the belt(s) have had a re-texture as well, bring new color and richness to your outfit.

=========================================================================================
 Installation:

	Download with Nexus mod manager (recommended)
   
   Installation (manually):
	-Take the \"textures folder\" and extract to you desktop
	-Find your clothes folder (local disc:C/program filesx64 (or not64 depending on your OS)/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data/textures/clothes
	-delete your \"archmage folder\" (you may keep it in the recycle bin if you wish to uninstall)
	-with your NEW archmage folder, drop the folder in your \"Clothes\" folder

So you will drop your folder here: .../common/skyrim/data/textures/clothes   <drop in there!

***upon startup you should have your new robes!!!***
		ENJOY! :D
=========================================================================================
Please endorse and share in the fun!
thanks again
-MorninJerky
author: MorninJerky
